thread.section_title: eTeacherBiblical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eTeacherBiblical | eteacherbiblical.com
thread.title: Joshua Quinn

author: Joshua Quinn
title: Joshua Quinn
text:
I am very pleased with the grace I have recieved every step of the way with eTeacher Group. eTeacher Group has been extremely helpful and understanding, with regards to understanding my financial situation. I have also enjoyed my classes and look forward to them every week. The class is a nice size, not too small, not to big. The teacher is experienced, helpful and I am learning well under his instruction. I am looking forward greatly to being able to read the Bible in Hebrew, as inspired by God and I am blessed that God led me to this resource!
Yehowah saves,
Joshua
